answers.answer: There may be several things which may be causing "white patches", the most common one cause of this is yeast infection. It is treat by antifungal medications.The cause of the yeast infection may be due to a serious illness you may have experienced, antibiotic/steroid usage. Pregnancy, systemic disease (i.e. diabetes) may be contributing factors.All in all, I would suggest scheduling appointment with your friendly dentist.
